tasks.title: [SEAN] Basis Partnership Proposal
tasks.description: Tell Sean: I'll give you requirements, deliver code, and you get 10-15% margin. Just send clients a link to a webpage that reads 'upload your Google Doc here'. VALUE PROP: Basis gets 15% profit margin PLUS all of Sean's hours back (~80 hrs/month).

tasks.title: [CHARLIE] First Mover Partnership Strategy
tasks.description: Talk to Charlie about partnership strategy: First mover advantage, leverage each other's progress, brand that quickly produces working software. KEY INSIGHT: AI sells fastest when it doesn't require humans to change.
